title: Daniel 1:8-20
description: Scripture reference used in FCT Module 4

content.contextInModule: Daniel's Integrity (Daniel 1:8-20; 6:1-28) \- Daniel's refusal to compromise his values, even in a foreign land, highlights the importance of adhering to ethical standards, a message relevant for Christian technologists facing moral dilemmas.
